sentences.en: A large portico provides a suitably impressive entrance to the chapel.
sentences.cn: 小教堂入口处宽敞的柱廊相当壮观.

sentences.en: a young woman of impressive educational attainments
sentences.cn: 一位学业成就斐然的年轻女子

sentences.en: All the Greenpeace people behaved with impressive forbearance and dignity.
sentences.cn: 所有绿色和平组织人士表现出了超乎寻常的克制和大度。

sentences.en: Among the guests was an impressive array of authors and critics.
sentences.cn: 来宾中有不少出色的作家和评论家。

sentences.en: an impressive building with a huge tower
He was far from impressive in his semi - final against Federer.
sentences.cn: 他在对费德勒的 半决赛 中表现平平.

sentences.en: He was well-built, but too fleshy to be impressive.
sentences.cn: 他肌肉发达，但是太胖了，没给人留下好印象。
那是一项了不起的成就。

sentences.en: Many literary academics simply parrot a set of impressive-sounding phrases.
sentences.cn: 许多文人只是机械地模仿一套听上去令人印象深刻的说法。

sentences.en: The building looked as impressive in actuality as it did in photographs.
sentences.cn: 这栋大楼外观雄伟，与照片中所见一模一样。
这些数字看上去确实很可观。

sentences.en: The film is technically impressive, but lacks real excitement.
sentences.cn: 这部电影的技术给人留下深刻的印象, 但是情节不够刺激.

sentences.en: The solid feel of the car's shell is impressive.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车的外壳给人的感觉异常坚固。

sentences.en: The system uses an impressive graphical interface.
sentences.cn: 这一系统采用了特别好的图形界面。

sentences.en: The thoroughness of the evaluation process we went through was impressive.
sentences.cn: 我们亲历的评估过程面面俱到，给人留下了深刻印象。

sentences.en: They have claimed some impressive scalps in their bid for the championship.
sentences.cn: 他们已在夺取冠军的征途上获得显著进展。

sentences.en: This cinema is so impressive that we can't help crying.
sentences.cn: 这影片如此感人以至我们禁不住流下泪来.

words.tran_cn: 敏感的；感受性强烈的；易感动的
印象；效果，影响；压痕，印记；感想
印象主义者；印象派作家
盖印；强征；传送；给予某人深刻印象
感人的；令人钦佩的；给人以深刻印象的

trans.tran_cn: 令人赞叹的，给人深刻印象的
trans.tran_en: something that is impressive makes you admire it because it is very good, large, important etc
